metadata.dc:author: Alonso Pérez, J
Navarro Bernal, J M
Ruiz Santiago, F
Fernández Pérez, A
Martín Marcos, J
Fernández Ollero, L
Rubí Uría, J
metadata.dc:description: We present a cervical thymic cyst clinically manifest as a lateral neck mass and studied preoperatively with ultrasound. We point to the sonographic findings that allow us to include the cervical thymic cyst as one of the diagnostic possibilities.
metadata.dc:title: Quiste tímico cervical.
[Thymus gland cervical cysts].
